website_summaries.verdict: Even at high volume, This model can reach surprisingly low frequencies without distortion, while the cabinet is durable enough to withstand the powerful vibrations produced by the amp.
pros: The 500-watt RMS amplifier allows for both power and accuracy in this model
Users feel the impact of crashes and explosions when the unit is used for home theater, while the foundation of low-frequency instruments is clearly audible when used for music
The driver produces frequencies all the way down to an impressive 16 Hz with distortion-free clarity
The cabinet is sealed and custom tuned to avoid rattling or vibration when in use, so users only hear their audio
cons: The unit is large and heavy, meaning finding the right position for optimum sound will require users to have a good bit of extra space

customer_reviews.title: I'm shaking in my boots as I listen to this beast of a subwoofer.
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, home shaking bass. Adding the PB2000 to my new high end speaker system gave it that extra warmth and kick that the speakers needed. The extra low bass and warmth that you literally feel makes this subwoofer a NEED TO HAVE item to go along with your speakers. This subwoofer is a monster in sound and in size (it's HUGE) and I can't say enough wonderful things about it. Just do yourself a favor and buy it. Don't believe me? read about it in the online audio/video forums. You really won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Fun Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly delivers more base than I ever expected out of a home system, with ease. Armageddon, was playing on HBO when I first hooked it up. At one point my wife shouted WOO HOO, a first. She said, it's like we're watching a movie we haven't seen before. This speaker adds incredible dimension to my sound system. The only thing I would want added to the speaker is the ability to adjust it remotely, the sound is awesome/incredible.I can not hear anything but pure joy coming out of this engineering marvel.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Colvin

customer_reviews.title: This sub is extrodinary and I'm very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Coming from a KLIPSCH 15 inch I had my doubts if this sub would be enough. That all went away when I hooked it up and threw in the movie Oblivion! This sub is extrodinary and I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sal Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, outdated, many better options, no returns
customer_reviews.text: This is a hugely outdated sub, massive, I tried to get quality sound out of it, and called svs and still very disappointed. I have a very nice velodyne and this replaced a not so nice Polk sub, not at all happy w it, could barely hear the bass despite going thru set up options w svs (svs helpline is fantastic). Nice exterior but ridiculous in size. My velodyne is half the size w much better bass. If you want to buy this get it direct from manuf, Amazon doesn’t have this as a return item😣 ps moved sub to a different room and much better sound.
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of power, almost too much for my denon 3500 amp. But I like it. It has a chuffing issue in the port at low and intense frequencies which is made much worse with the fact that the cover covers both the speaker and the port. Would be nice if some how the cover was designed around the port instead of over it but I guess that wouldn't look as good. The chuffing is about 5 times worse with the cover on. You can take the cover off but then the speaker is not protected. For the price, I don't think it can be beat, however.
customer_reviews.author: trevor zell

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic subwoofer at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have only set this sub up with stereo speakers, 7 channels have yet to be installed, but it has impressed the hell out of me. Playing many different types of music, it has shown effortless, clean, well defined bass. It is capable of playing very loud bass, as well as quiet subtle bass. Can't wait to get the rest of my speakers installed! Update: I have hooked up my 7.1 surround with this sub. The sub produces bass that is present without being overwhelming. Blends perfectly with my bookshelf speakers. My room is 14x20 and the sub is a perfect size for the room. Highly recommend this subwoofer. I only wish i had bought one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Mengles

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Addition So Far ...
customer_reviews.text: This review is a work in progress. I bought this speaker to add much needed, and much desired low end to my editing suite at home. While I work mostly on studio monitors with flat response, I also use that same setup to watch movies. I'm happy watching movies on a 4K computer monitor, but I want to be able to experience much more out of the sound in cinema and music. I feel this subwoofer more than accomplishes this hitting the lowest of low frequencies and a powerful and tight manner. I will need to update this review as I continue to enjoy this speaker. I can't imagine anyone could go wrong adding this to their home theatre setup.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald B Erese

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and get one
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I've owned serious subwoofers before in the car audio world for many many years, just getting around to putting together my dream home system, a Marantz receiver, Klipsch and Boston speakers....narrowed my sub choice to this PB2000, a Klipsch and an Earthquake...OMG.... I am sooo happy I chose this SVS, I have a very large living room, and I feel this enormous and clear bass punching me in all places of the room... Very well made as well, I couldnt of asked for anything more, except maybe a 2nd one, lol
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing low frequency response.
customer_reviews.text: This sub woofer is amazing, i listen to a lot of bass heavy music so the upgrade from my 8 inch 100 watt Yamaha to this was much needed. this sub woofer can pump out super low frequencies with ease. its ability to switch frequencies on the fly is what differentiates it from other sub woofers on the market. when listening to heavy bass EDM such as G Jones, Tipper, or Bassnectar it performs wonderfully and can create massive sound pressure in my room with no problem. while at the same time isolating the noise to just my room. this is important as i live in an apartment complex and prefer not to have my neighbors knocking on my door.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B.

customer_reviews.title: SVS does it again!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I got this. At first, had some issues hooking it up with my Onkyo SR-806...then had to do some research just to find out that my 2 fronts were set to 'FULL BAND'...once I put them to 80hz and made sure the sub was hooked up correctly, jesus. 94% of the people on here gave this subwoofer a 5 star rating on Amazon for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Highum

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an audiophile by any means. I knew SVS speakers were a quality item before I purchased this and I needed a new sub because my current one died (for the second time!). The sale price was attractive and with the SVS name I was pretty sure it'd be fine. And indeed it was fine! Rocked the whole house and made movies sound like a theater. Pay attention to the size though. I didn't realize the ported one was much larger than the non-ported one. In fact it's large enough to sit on if you need another chair.
customer_reviews.author: Buzzyhog

customer_reviews.title: I've never owned an actual subwoofer before, chances are you haven't either.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's not a super great bargain but you get what you pay for this subwoofer is amazing. Some reviews are saying the response isn't great for music but you just have to eq your bass or set your crossover differently between music and movies to achieve your desired level of bass. I tried and can not make this thing distorts, it's always clean. You cannot go wrong with this subwoofer and I have a moderately large theater area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: It certainly has good quality bass but not outstanding as others expressed. I only difference this has with my existing bic pl200 is that it goes lower. i am really not satisfied for the price i bought this because i am getting the same bass quality with my pl200 with half of its price.
customer_reviews.author: Shaik Mahaboob Vali

customer_reviews.title: This makes things fall off the walls.
customer_reviews.text: The SVS PB-2000 Subwoofer has very good quality and adds the bass kick I needed for my home theater. It is very solid and well built. I am totally satisfied with this subwoofer.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Buy it Now, tell the wife later...
customer_reviews.text: It's an SVS sub so not much else to say. Nail down everything in your house because it will rattle your sofa, dishes, fridge, bones... Get low, get loud, blow stuff up. I'd give it more stars if I could. (While not a sealed sub it also does an excellent job with most music). Be aware that you may earn the "Most hated neighbor of the year" award unless you invite them all over for movie night. (I have it paired with Yamaha's high-end 9.2 channel flagship receiver, everything else is Klipsch). KABOOM!
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Booming Clear Sound for Movies and Music
customer_reviews.text: This Sub is the best I’ve ever had. Sound quality is awesome and works great with my Pioneer receiver and infinity speakers. Great sound for movies and music.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Williams

customer_reviews.title: Big boom
customer_reviews.text: Body rippling bass that is accurate. Doesn't play notes it doesn't need to play. Will elevate your movie watching experience to the next level. Things that are heavy sound and feel heavy.
customer_reviews.author: carlos santiago

customer_reviews.title: Great sub
customer_reviews.text: I love this subwoofer. This was bought to complete a dual setup. Powerful with great sound for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B.

customer_reviews.title: I cannot recommend this sub enough
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. I cannot recommend this sub enough. My only issue now is that it shakes my house so hard that my projector shakes in the other room. I need to find a better projector mount. This thing is insane.
customer_reviews.author: Dejavu

customer_reviews.title: Good Subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know what i was missing from my old 10inch Subwoofer. I'm glad i upgraded to this, what a big difference! Buy it you will never regret it. 😄👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Butch B

customer_reviews.title: Really look into this subwoofer before buying
customer_reviews.text: Thought for the price it would hit harder, I called consumer support they had me swap out the sub and amp with replacements ,it did help , but still not as powerful as I thought for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than Donald Trump's hands and louder than Chris Christie!!
customer_reviews.text: This subwoofer is a great addition to any system. Shakes the house! Movies are a lot more realistic. Great product and great service from SVS. Can't say enough about how good this sub is.
customer_reviews.author: John Van Haren

customer_reviews.title: ... in is 14x26x9 and this sub fills the room nicely.
customer_reviews.text: The room that the sub is placed in is 14x26x9 and this sub fills the room nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Haseeb Iqbal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Monster or earthquake or volcano inside the room .... very nice
customer_reviews.author: mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Best sub i have ever owned by far
customer_reviews.text: I can't even put into words how amazing this sub is. I highly recommend it, you will be so glad that you did.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher May

customer_reviews.title: Great sub, it will not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these in the Theater. Great sub, it will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: S&A

customer_reviews.title: The Subwoofer works Great.
customer_reviews.text: I have no disk like for this PB-2000 I like the subwoofer it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie  C.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: It's BIG, it's amazing, SVS customer service is on point. Took some fine tuning to achieve its capabilities. Once dialed in, exceeds expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Rumble
customer_reviews.text: Media room is shaking. Good for small media room. Don’t settle for less. This will add a dimension to your movie experience
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My bass journey is over!
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these in a 2300 ft^3 room and they dig deep! Very articulate bass with excellent control and dynamics. The oak finish also looks fantastic, so if aesthetics are a concern do not worry.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Ferrier

customer_reviews.title: solid subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: I plan on getting a second one after I move.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory D. Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: A subwoofer you can love
customer_reviews.text: Added the subwoofer to my home theater. Love the sound quality. Well worth the value when compared to other sub at this price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These things ROCK! BOOM! I have two of ...
customer_reviews.text: These things ROCK! BOOM! I have two of them. Was a bit hesitant ordering something so big from Amazon but the delivery was flawless.
customer_reviews.author: iLovePrime

customer_reviews.title: Just buy this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have three subwoofers from SVS and they all are absolutely amazing!!! They hit lows that shake the house to its foundation!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Green

customer_reviews.title: Bummer!
customer_reviews.text: Waited 2 days late and then finally gets delivered and doesn’t work. Very unhappy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Added something to my system i never thought it could.
customer_reviews.text: I had Klipsch RF3 ll's and matching surround speakers for 7.1 setup with different subwoofer and when i decided to give a chance for SVS PB2000, i wasn't expecting much. Let me tell you, this sub added many great things to my system that i can't believe it, everything sounds 10X better now and crisp and most importantly (for me at least) bass quality is so good that it brings other speakers to different levels too. Very very happy with this sub, thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: M. A.

customer_reviews.title: Bass is great but you really need to have it dialed in ...
customer_reviews.text: This sub is a beast. It's flipping huge. Bass is great but you really need to have it dialed in or else your missing out on what this thing can do. I highly recommend you buy some vibration dampeners. SVS makes a nice set but a little expensive, over $60.00 shipped but they work as advertised. The clarity of bass on this woofer is immense. It shakes while room and my sofa. It shakes the hair follicles on my arm. I don't think ill ever need more than this one sub for a room my size.
customer_reviews.author: isaac soto

customer_reviews.title: Great subwoofer in this price point.
customer_reviews.text: I was using Boston Acoustic 5.1 system+ sub woofer system prior. And I thought that it was decent. Then I went to a Paradigm system with this new SVS PB2000 sub. Holy cow what an improvement. This sub is incredible. The base completely complements the sound system perfectly. The base is a nice deep full sound. Never muddy and always pure. The room is surrounded and full of sound way better than my BA sub ever did. I opted for this 12" over the 10" and I am glad that i did. I did read that the PB1000 is a great sub, but if you can afford to go with the ported PB2000 instead, i highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and volume
customer_reviews.text: Your ears will thank you. Excellent sound and volume. Customer service is AMAZING if you need any help or support from SVS, a real person that works for them will speak with you. Resolution is fast and friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Megan B

customer_reviews.title: SVS PB-2000 is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical about getting another ported subwoofer because of the boominess that's associated with them but the SVS PB-2000 is the best ported sub I've ever listened to. If you place it properly and adjust the settings as recommended with your receiver, you will get tight punchy bass with music and what it does for movies is unreal. I have over 3500 cubic sq. Ft. Of space in my family room alone and this sub takes care of everything musically and home theater duties, just imagine what it's going to be like when I get the second PB-2000 .
customer_reviews.author: jonathan w. cyrus

customer_reviews.title: ... the way other guys describe it - it's the best. Now watching TV
customer_reviews.text: Just the way other guys describe it - it's the best. Now watching TV, movies, and listening to music is different - it's the best time of the day. Just relaxing and listening to the sound in a higher level of standard. Thanks to the SVS PB2000. I'll recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: dwight z. alcantar

customer_reviews.title: Best boom for your buck
customer_reviews.text: The sound fills the space remarkably well and is smooth, flat and not boomy at all. It's great for movies and music alike. My neighbors don't appreciate it as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrell Midland

customer_reviews.title: This sub is great. Was originally going to go with the pb ...
customer_reviews.text: This sub is great. Was originally going to go with the pb 1000 but knew I wanted this one. Just buy it, it is well worth it. Bass is extremely clear with no distortion. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bxbigpipi

customer_reviews.title: Brace yourself
customer_reviews.text: Incredible sound. Be sure to secure any loose objects on shelves in adjacent rooms before you blast off.
customer_reviews.author: Festizio

customer_reviews.title: This is the best subwoofer I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the best subwoofer I have ever had. It is so good to feel and hear the bass on action movies as well as such movies as "The Book Thief".
customer_reviews.author: hardway

customer_reviews.title: Love the way my walls shake
customer_reviews.text: Love the way my walls shake. She is big, plan to set aside a good footprint. Totally worth the funds tho if you want to hear the low end of your music and movies especially.
customer_reviews.author: Schon Morgen

customer_reviews.title: seemed like brand new
customer_reviews.text: Incredible sub, and I couldn't tell it was ever used, seemed like brand new.
customer_reviews.author: C. Benedetti

customer_reviews.title: I use it for primarily music and movies and I have never been disappointed in the five months that I have had it
customer_reviews.text: The price may scare some people away but the performance of this subwoofer is well worth it. I use it for primarily music and movies and I have never been disappointed in the five months that I have had it. Great sub to own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a must have for home theater
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th sub I've owned, and it's by far the best one.its also the biggest one I've had owned.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Replaced a Velodyne SPL with this sub and it was the best decision I have made
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!!! Replaced a Velodyne SPL with this sub and it was the best decision I have made. This sub performs in my home theater no question. I was contemplating getting 2 and glad I only got 1. My theater is 20x30 and one is more than enough.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding sub!
customer_reviews.text: Best sub I've had so far! Sounds smooth and the lows are really low. I expected it to be big but when I finally got to the sub (packaged in 3 boxes) it was absolutely a beast! One call did a great job covering the original box with an outer box and was delivered super fast.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just got it but sounds good looks good svs costumer service is super
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SVS
customer_reviews.text: SVS PB2000 REVIEW: Good sub that delivers solid low frequencies. When i opened the box i said what all the ladies say when i drop my trousers, "thats pretty darn big". Sticks out from wall a good 2 feet, maybe slightly more. Has a metal front grill, which indicates to me its a well built unit. I dont have any complaints on this subwoofer, you have to ask yourself is it worth shelling out 8 hundred for a very capeable sub (SVS) or is a $300ish pretty good sub good enough (bic"america)?
customer_reviews.author: rinney

customer_reviews.title: Just ok...
customer_reviews.text: Does not deliver the chest pounding it should. Anyone that says it does has not experienced real chest pounding. Sounds ok but not worth the money for what it delivers IMO. Don't even post a comment talking about placement. I know what I'm doing....
customer_reviews.author: Nitro

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, ok value
customer_reviews.text: This sub is solid but does not live up to the hype. I think this is a case of you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Chingy

product_meta.title: SVS PB-2000 Subwoofer (Black Ash) – 12-inch Driver, 500-Watts RMS, Ported Cabinet
product_meta.description:
Ported SVS PB-2000 SubwooferThe Sledge STA–500D is the sonic engine that brings an unprecedented amp technology and sophistication not found anywhere else at this price point. On sheer power alone, it effortlessly punches out 500 watts RMS and 1100 peak watts. Then add its quick, smooth and precise digital signal processing at all drive levels. Plus, flexible connectivity for easy set–up and integration into your home theater or stereo system. Include an energy saving standby mode of under 0.5 watts. And lastly, pair it with a freshly designed, exhaustively tested all–new SVS 2000–Series driver. All told, a never–before–at–this–price sonic package.

SVS 12" High Output DriverDesigned from scratch–and optimized through exhaustive testing until it delivered unprecedented performance we were after–the all new 2000–series driver does us proud. Matched and maximized to its Sledge amplifier, it effortlessly delivers the STA–500D's precision, dynamic flexibility and raw punch. The result: the all–new driver delivers higher output, improved linearity and lower distortion. Which means loads of clean, precise, deep powerful bass for your movies and music.

Premium Finishes, Modern Styling, Versatile Placement Options, Easy Room IntegrationTaking design cues from its popular Ultra siblings, the PB–2000 has a clean, modern look. Its handsome radius corners, premium black grain finish and metal grille are elegant touches that go with any dA?cor. With modest dimensions, and weight of 66 pounds, it is a manageable size to integrate into any room.

SVS: The sound you want, priced so you can have it.Whichever SVS product you choose, you will be confident knowing you are getting the finest audio for the money. Buy now and we'll ship it to you free. Plus, you'll have 45 days to audition your SVS purchase at home: with your gear, your settings in your environment.
feature_bullets: High-excursion 12-inch driver produces room-shaking SPLs and hits extreme low frequencies with control and accuracy. A powerful foundation of sound for home theater and music.

500 watts RMS, 1,100+ watts peak power Sledge STA-500D DSP amplifier boasts features normally found in subwoofers costing three times the price. Delivers effortless power for reference level output with pinpoint accuracy.
Rigidly braced, sonically inert and custom tuned ported cabinet for pure, distortion-free bass at all drive levels.
“SVS is offering technology normally reserved for subwoofers two or three times the asking price of PB-2000. Sets a new bar in the performance/price category." -Audioholics
